Take advantage of this awesome convertible unit.
This hi rise condo building is located in the heart of “the new east side"/Lakeshore East, just a step away from the lake.
This building is just steps off of Michigan Ave, the lake, and Navy Pier.
Cats & dogs ok - no weight limit.
Garage parking extra.
No security deposit.

This building has fabulous country club style amenities including: -Spectacular lake, river and city views -Spacious floor plans -24 hour doorman -Outdoor pool and spa -State of the art full fitness center -Game room and glamorous party room for you and your guests -Sky garden lounge overlooking the lake and the city with a complimentary coffee bar and spacious seating to relax  This completely upgraded unit offers a contemporary feel with dramatic finishes including: -Washer/Dryer in unit -Ceramic tile entry -Impala black granite islands with cherry cabinetry -Floor to ceiling windows with unbelievable views -*select units offer balconies please inquire
take advantage of this jr 1 bed unit
Velocity Apartment Group
